# thetalake_legal_hold (Data Source)

Theta Lake Legal Hold Data Source. Retrieves information about a legal hold.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "thetalake_legal_hold" "example" {
  id = "123"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Legal Hold ID

### Read-Only

- `case_id` (Number) Case ID associated with the hold
- `description` (String) Legal Hold Description
- `name` (String) Legal Hold Name
